Provision(IItemLevelRecoveryConnectionsOperations, String, String, String, String, String, String, ILRRequestResource) Provision(IItemLevelRecoveryConnectionsOperations, String, String, String, String, String, String, ILRRequestResource)

Edit

Provisions a script which invokes an iSCSI connection to the backup data. Executing this script opens a file explorer displaying all the recoverable files and folders. This is an asynchronous operation. To know the status of provisioning, call GetProtectedItemOperationResult API.

public static void Provision(this IItemLevelRecoveryConnectionsOperations operations, string vaultName, string resourceGroupName, string fabricName, string containerName, string protectedItemName, string recoveryPointId, ILRRequestResource resourceILRRequest)<ExtensionAttribute>
Public Shared Sub Provision(operations As IItemLevelRecoveryConnectionsOperations, vaultName As String, resourceGroupName As String, fabricName As String, containerName As String, protectedItemName As String, recoveryPointId As String, resourceILRRequest As ILRRequestResource)
Parameters
operations
IItemLevelRecoveryConnectionsOperations IItemLevelRecoveryConnectionsOperations

The operations group for this extension method.

vaultName
String String

The name of the recovery services vault.

resourceGroupName
String String

The name of the resource group where the recovery services vault is present.

fabricName
String String

Fabric name associated with the backed up items.

containerName
String String

Container name associated with the backed up items.

protectedItemName
String String

Backed up item name whose files/folders are to be restored.

recoveryPointId
String String

Recovery point ID which represents backed up data. iSCSI connection will be provisioned for this backed up data.

resourceILRRequest
ILRRequestResource ILRRequestResource

resource ILR request

Revoke(IItemLevelRecoveryConnectionsOperations, String, String, String, String, String, String) Revoke(IItemLevelRecoveryConnectionsOperations, String, String, String, String, String, String)

Edit

Revokes an iSCSI connection which can be used to download a script. Executing this script opens a file explorer displaying all recoverable files and folders. This is an asynchronous operation.

public static void Revoke(this IItemLevelRecoveryConnectionsOperations operations, string vaultName, string resourceGroupName, string fabricName, string containerName, string protectedItemName, string recoveryPointId)<ExtensionAttribute>
Public Shared Sub Revoke(operations As IItemLevelRecoveryConnectionsOperations, vaultName As String, resourceGroupName As String, fabricName As String, containerName As String, protectedItemName As String, recoveryPointId As String)

operations
IItemLevelRecoveryConnectionsOperations IItemLevelRecoveryConnectionsOperations

String String

The name of the recovery services vault.

String String

fabricName
String String

Fabric name associated with the backed up items.

containerName
String String

Container name associated with the backed up items.

protectedItemName
String String

Backed up item name whose files/folders are to be restored.

recoveryPointId
String String

Recovery point ID which represents backed up data. iSCSI connection will be revoked for this backed up data.
